code: export var required=function required(value){if(value)return undefined;return'Это поле обязательно';};export var requiredFieldMaxValue=function requiredFieldMaxValue(value){if(value){if(value.length>20)return"\u041C\u0430\u043A\u0441\u0438\u043C\u0430\u043B\u044C\u043D\u043E\u0435 \u043A\u043E\u043B\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043E \u0441\u0438\u043C\u0432\u043E\u043B\u043E\u0432 ".concat(20," ");return undefined;}return'Field is required';};export var maxLengthCreator=function maxLengthCreator(maxLength){return function(value){if(value.length>maxLength)return"\u041C\u0430\u043A\u0441\u0438\u043C\u0430\u043B\u044C\u043D\u043E\u0435 \u043A\u043E\u043B\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043E \u0441\u0438\u043C\u0432\u043E\u043B\u043E\u0432 ".concat(maxLength," ");return undefined;};};export var maxLengthCreatorProfile=function maxLengthCreatorProfile(maxLength){return function(value){if(value){if(value.length>maxLength)return"\u041C\u0430\u043A\u0441\u0438\u043C\u0430\u043B\u043D\u043E\u0435 \u043A\u043E\u043B\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043E  ".concat(maxLength," \u0441\u0438\u043C\u0432\u043E\u043B\u043E\u0432");return undefined;}};};export var minLengthCreator=function minLengthCreator(minLength){return function(value){if(value.length<minLength)return"Min length is ".concat(minLength," symbols");return undefined;};};
